message.body: HEy do you and dad still want to be in our super bowl blocks? $20
Ok dad will i'll let you know about me in 15 min
You can ask around at work too and ask mike ###### bec he said he wanted to do it
Ok how many people are in it and how much do you win i am asking
We are trying to get 100 people. That way the total pot is $2000 divided by 4 quarters.
For example first quarter wins 150.. 2nd quarter wins 300 ..3rd wins 550 and final quarter wins 1000
If we can't get 100 people then we are going to try for 50 people. Then it will be $1000 divided by the 4 quarters
Ok me and fan are in i'll ask victor
Hey ill be over in about 20 mins
